title: Code Review Prompt
description: A guide for conducting thorough code reviews
template:
Perform a comprehensive code review of the following {language} code:

```
{code_snippet}
```

Your review should address:

1. Code quality and readability
2. Potential bugs or edge cases
3. Performance optimizations
4. Security vulnerabilities
5. Adherence to language conventions and best practices

Provide specific, actionable feedback with examples of how to improve the code.
